parameter.name: term
parameter.description: For current Find Options will be only geoId to include in output

if.script: resultList.add([geoId:termGeo.geoId, label:(termGeo.geoCodeAlpha2 ? termGeo.geoCodeAlpha2 + ' - ' : '') + termGeo.geoName, geoName:termGeo.geoName, geoCodeAlpha2:termGeo.geoCodeAlpha2])
for (geo in geoList) resultList.add([geoId:geo.toGeoId, label:(geo.geoCodeAlpha2 ? geo.geoCodeAlpha2 + ' - ' : '') + geo.geoName, geoName:geo.geoName, geoCodeAlpha2:geo.geoCodeAlpha2])
